creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: tall, heavily decorated, multi-story temple gate at center; human figure descending the stairs in front; temple grounds and tall trees in background
marks: Left margin: {Jizuri, Showa 12 nen saku, Yomei-mon LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LLC, in pencil: [Yoma Gate
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Yomei Gate
